name: tw-project
description: Starter for Tailwind CSS using webpack and postcss
author: @devsmitin

scripts.start: webpack --mode development && cd shopify && theme deploay && theme open && theme watch
scripts.start:prod: webpack --mode development && cd shopify && theme deploay --env=production && theme open --env=production && theme watch --env=production
scripts.publish: webpack --mode production && cd shopify && theme deploy --env=production
scripts.publish:dev: webpack --mode production && cd shopify && theme deploy
